snippet.title: Organ Quarter PS VR2 version Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Organ Quarter is a VR survival horror game focused on what made survival horror great: labyrinthine environments, resource management and well-balanced puzzling. An homage to the slow, methodical survival horror experiences of the '90s, explore the compelling nightmare world and enjoy the most intimate horror experience yet.

Title: Organ Quarter
Genre: VR Survival Horror
Supported Hardware: PlayStation®VR2
Distributing Stores (Download only): PlayStation™Store
Number of Players: 1
Online Play: No online play is available
Languages: Japanese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish,Portuguese
Price:
Release Date: 2023 Spring
Ratings: ESRB M, PEGI 16
Developer: Outer Brain Studios
Publisher: AMATA K.K.
Official Website (Amata Games): https://amata.games/en/game/organ-quarter/
Copyright: ©2017 Outer Brain Studios All rights reserved.
